Desc.eng: Don't take it personally, captain, but I expected a larger force.
My squadron arrived here first, sir. The main forces are on their way, but they are going to need some more time. We don't expect troubles. Van Helsing is here.
That's flattering. All right, captain. Stay with me and help me clear out the area.
Great. Captain, I'll lead the way. You will secure the places we have already cleared out.
Bah! " Van Helsing is here!" Don't even mention the ghost girl. She is nothing but a beautiful sidekick.
